ingredients.ingredient: 1/2 can sugar (use sweetened condensed milk can as measure)

cookingTips: Stir constantly over medium heat to prevent scorching and ensure even cooking
The mixture should be thick and pull away from the sides of the pan when ready
Cool on parchment before rolling into balls or cutting into squares
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through the stirring technique and help them recognize when the mixture has reached the proper consistency for shaping.
